title: Ceramic, Globular Bell with Suspension Ring-Handle and with Stylized Flower and Scrolling Grapevine Decor
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Shirley Nye in memory of Warren E. Cox
medium: Probably Mino ware, Shino type, or Utsutsugawa ware; possibly Korean "punch'ong" ware: light gray stoneware with cloudy white glaze over openwork decoration and over decoration inlaid in white slip
provenance: Shirley Nye, New York, NY, gift to HUAM
